Repository Name Unauthorized: Carver Hill Memorial and Historical Society, Inc
Notes: The Carver-Hill School began in 1915 and was a segregated school for African-American children .Museum honors and chronicles the lives of the local African-American community.focusing on black history and culture. The Carver-Hill Museum serves as an archive for artifacts related to Carver-Hill School including photographs In addition, the museum features important historical documents of local families and the community.
